title: Irrigation Installation & Repair
intro: Stop wasting water on driveway runoff. Smart irrigation systems designed for deep root watering and compliance with Austin watering restrictions.
highlights: Drip irrigation conversion for flower beds and foundations
Smart Wi-Fi controllers (Rachio, Hunter) with weather sensing
Pressure regulation to prevent misting and evaporation
Annual backflow testing and system audits

avgCost.notes: Repairs can be under $1k; full new efficiency systems for standard lots range higher.

faqs.q: Why is my water bill so high?
faqs.a: Often it's due to unseen leaks or inefficient spray heads that mist water into the air. A system audit can identify these waste points immediately.

faqs.q: Is drip irrigation better than sprinklers?
faqs.a: For planting beds, yes. Installers use drip to deliver water directly to the roots with 90%+ efficiency. Rotors are still best for large turf areas.
